user.title: Australia Post MyPost Business
user.description: Choose how to authenticate with Australia Post.

browser_auth.title: Browser Login
browser_auth.description:
1. Enter your Account Number (found in MyPost Business under Business Details)
2. [Click here to open AusPost login]({authorize_url})
3. Log in with your MyPost Business email and password
4. After login, copy the full URL from your browser's address bar
5. Paste it below

data.callback_url: Paste the URL from your browser here

partners_token.title: Partners Token
partners_token.description: Enter your eCommerce Partners token from MyPost Business (Business Details > eCommerce Partners). This is the recommended method.

api_credentials.title: API Credentials
api_credentials.description: Enter your Shipping & Tracking API credentials from the [Australia Post Developer Centre](https://auspost.com.au/lodgement/api/documentation/). This is the recommended method.

password.title: Email + Password Login
password.description: Enter your MyPost Business credentials. Your password is used only for initial authentication and is not stored. Note: this method may be blocked by Cloudflare bot protection.

reauth_partners_token.title: Re-authenticate Partners Token
reauth_partners_token.description: Your Partners token is no longer valid. Please enter a new token from MyPost Business (Business Details > eCommerce Partners).

reauth_api_credentials.title: Re-authenticate API Credentials
reauth_api_credentials.description: Your API credentials need to be updated.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate with Australia Post
reauth_confirm.description: Your session has expired. Please re-enter your credentials.

select_organisation.title: Select Organisation
select_organisation.description: You have multiple organisations. Select which one to track.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid credentials. Please check your client ID, client secret, email or password.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Australia Post.
error.cloudflare_blocked: Australia Post login blocked by Cloudflare bot protection. Consider using API Credentials instead.
error.rate_limited: Too many login attempts. Please wait and try again.
error.missing_account_number: Account number is required. You can find it in MyPost Business under Business Details.
error.no_auth_code: No authorization code found in the URL. Make sure you copied the full URL from your browser after logging in.
error.no_organisations: No organisations found for this account.
